messages.message: Hi all, how do you delete a user from prod? Is it possible to rename an Organization?

We can deactivate a user via API (we don’t support fully deleting). Some buttons might be getting added to the UI soon (<!subteam^SQC4GLFN2>). if And no it’s not possible to rename an organization, you would have to delete it and re-create. Let me know if you need help deactivating someone now, just need their username.

Thanks, good to know! Theres no risk to the user being available, but the other day we had issues with getting Natwest onto prod so I created an account and gave them all the password, we’ll be using this tomorrow again, but going forward I want them using their own account, not this ‘master’ temp account I created during the last training session.
